title: Teneo's Nickel on the Rise of Populism and Impact to EU (Audio)
itunes:title: Teneo's Nickel on the Rise of Populism and Impact to EU (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Carsten Nickel, Deputy Director of Research at Teneo Intelligence, on the future of Britain's leadership and the status of the EU countries.
